apiDocs.authenticationDesc1: Authentication is handled via an API key. You must include your API key in the
apiDocs.endpointDesc: All requests should be made to the following endpoint:
apiDocs.requestBodyDesc: The request body must be a JSON object with the following fields:

apiDocs.sessionIdField: (string, optional): The ID of the conversation session to send the message to.
apiDocs.contactIdField: (integer, optional): The ID of the contact to send the message to.

workflows.importDescription: Upload a workflow JSON file to import it into your workspace.

createDialog.title: Create New Workflow

detailsDialog.title: Edit Workflow Details
detailsDialog.description: Update the details for your workflow. Click save when you're done.
detailsDialog.triggerPhrasesPlaceholder: Type a phrase and press Enter
detailsDialog.triggerPhrasesHint: Add phrases that will directly trigger this workflow.

settingsDialog.title: Workflow Settings
settingsDialog.description: Configure advanced settings for your workflow
settingsDialog.enableIntentDetectionDescription: Allow workflow to be triggered by detected user intents
settingsDialog.autoTriggerWorkflowDescription: Automatically execute workflow when intent is detected
settingsDialog.confidenceThresholdDescription: Minimum confidence score required to trigger workflow automatically

intentDialog.description: Configure an intent that will trigger this workflow
intentDialog.keywordsHint: Add keywords that identify this intent
intentDialog.trainingPhrasesHint: Add example phrases users might say
intentDialog.confidenceHint: Minimum confidence score (0-1) to match this intent

entityDialog.description: Define an entity to extract from user messages
entityDialog.requiredDesc: Prompt user if this entity is not detected
entityDialog.promptIfMissingPlaceholder: e.g., What is your order number?
entityDialog.exampleValuesHint: Add example values for this entity

testIntentDialog.title: Test Intent Detection
testIntentDialog.description: Test your intent configuration with sample user input
testIntentDialog.noResults: No results yet. Enter a message and click Test.

validation.cannotSave: Cannot save workflow. Please fix the following issues:
validation.missingStartNode: Missing Start node or Trigger node (WebSocket, WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram)
validation.missingTrueEdge: Condition node "{{label}}" is missing TRUE edge
validation.missingFalseEdge: Condition node "{{label}}" is missing FALSE edge
validation.notConnected: Node "{{label}}" is not connected to the workflow

properties.selectNode: Select a node to view its properties.
properties.systemPromptPlaceholder: Enter a custom system prompt for this LLM node...
properties.systemPromptHint: Leave empty to use the agent's default system prompt
properties.promptPlaceholder: e.g., What is the capital of {{context.country}}?
properties.queryPlaceholder: e.g., What is the capital of {{context.country}}?
properties.codeArgumentsHint: Define input arguments that will be available in your code
properties.returnVariablesHint: Variables to return and store in context after execution
properties.pythonCodePlaceholder:
# Your arguments are available directly
# e.g., if you added 'data' as argument:
result = data['field'] * 2
properties.promptTextPlaceholder: e.g., What would you like to do today?
properties.promptTextHint: The message shown to the user.
properties.saveResponseHint: Variable to store user's response. Access with
properties.optionsHint: Optional. Leave empty for free-form text input.
properties.outputHint: This message will be sent back to the user as the final response.
properties.listenTipText: Images are automatically passed to LLM nodes for vision processing via {{context.user_attachments}}
properties.promptTextHelp: The message shown to the user.
properties.saveResponseHelp: Variable to store user's response. Access with
properties.optionsHelp: Optional. Leave empty for free-form text input.
properties.outputValueHelp: This message will be sent back to the user as the final response.
properties.startNodeDescription: This node marks the beginning of your workflow.

triggers.websocketDescription: Triggers workflow when a WebSocket message is received
triggers.whatsappDescription: Triggers workflow when a WhatsApp message is received
triggers.telegramDescription: Triggers workflow when a Telegram message is received
triggers.instagramDescription: Triggers workflow when an Instagram DM is received
triggers.fallbackAgentHelp: Agent to use if workflow fails or no intent matches

chat.updateContextDescription: Add or update variables in the conversation context.
chat.tagConversationDescription: Add tags to the conversation for organization and analytics.
chat.assignToAgentDescription: Route conversation to a specific agent or team.
